name: Missing Child (class project)
description: The player can respond to a computer that thinks the person in the report is their child. The mother AI asks the player if they’ve seen their son, or could help look for him. The intention of this project was to experiment with Unity's UI over a weekend, as a part of my university's game design class. The assignment was to use UI components to lead to a short bio of the student, which I chose to represent in the form of a missing persons poster.
